price: 121. Kuwaa hoygoodu waa Jahannama, kamana helaan xaggeeda meel ay ka hirgalaan.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ مَأۡوَىٰهُمۡ جَهَنَّمُ وَلَا يَجِدُونَ عَنۡهَا مَحِيصٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: ulāika mawāhum jahannamu walā yajidūna ʿanhā maḥīṣan
